'''Tracking Fire Ball''' is an [[aura]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Fireballs are spawned at 20-second intervals.
* Each fireball will trace the player and explode 3 times over 1.4 seconds, and disappear after it has traced the player 3 times.

==Damage==
{{Environmental Damage|1.5|fireball explosions|truedamage=2}}
